page.title: 08MORE CAVES
page.content: The {Greater Horseshoe Bats}eat insects but some eat fruit,nectar and one bat which is not found in this country drinks blood.Scientists come and analyse the water.They can tell what kind of plants were growing by testing the pollen content.Mr Joint told us that one scientist found out that there were traces of Hawthawn, Hazel,Giant Redwood and Horse Chestnut.After{Reeds Cave}we went to { {Rift Cave}which was much smaller than{ {Reeds Cave }we could not go in to this one because of the metal cover which was protecting the bats which went in there.The bats favour this cave,and every year there are more than a hundred bats in the{Rift Cave.}The bats go just inside the cave entrance so they do not get too cold.Mr Joint said you need a licence to handle bats,take them in to captivity and
